meanings.definition: A person or thing that attaches.
meanings.sent1: The attacher clipped the papers together.
meanings.sent2: The little attacher on the keychain was very useful.
meanings.sent3: The attacher, a helpful tool, kept everything organized.
meanings.sent4: She was like an attacher, bringing people together with her warm personality.
meanings.sent5: The attacher's role was crucial in keeping the project on track.

meanings.definition: To fasten or join one thing to another.
meanings.sent1: Please attacher the document to the email before sending it.
meanings.sent2: He used glue to attacher the broken pieces of the vase.
meanings.sent3: The children tried to attacher their toy cars to form a train.
meanings.sent4: Her words attachered his heart to hers, creating a strong bond.
meanings.sent5: The magnet was able to attacher the metal objects easily.

meanings.sent1: Music has the power to attacher people from different backgrounds.
meanings.sent2: Reading a good book can attacher you to the characters' emotions.
meanings.sent3: The joke he told attachered us in laughter.
meanings.sent4: Her wisdom attachered her to those seeking guidance.
meanings.sent5: The teacher's passion for learning attachered her students to the subject.
